bug.author: ericl
bug.summary: [tune] Should use TBXLogger and install it by default
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
When I ran a tune job with only pytorch installed, there were no tensorboard logs. It seems like TBXLogger wasn't enabled, and it also wasn't installed by default with Tune. cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/richardliaw>@richardliaw</denchmark-link>
